title: For Deleting DEVOURER RIOT I <3 YOU
body: Let the yi xin shy mains fall back to the depths of elo HELL

replies.body:
you do realise its worse for you know
they can go top and get guinsoos then they have devourer

> [{quoted}](name=FuriousFlameDude,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=GAvmhham,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-05-04T02:51:27.524+0000)
>
> you do realise its worse for you know
> they can go top and get guinsoos then they have devourer

That's all good. If their lane opponent lets that happen, then they deserve it.

Yeah I won't be playing Shyv anymore despite being one of my absolute favourite champions, she's useless without Devourer as it was. Can't build Guinsoo's or too squishy, also costs too much, even if I did go Cinderhulk, the ramp up would be completely and utterly late game.

Shyv just is not a lane champion to me, counters maybe 1 other champion, and that probably isn't even the case now since that was Vlad and he's bursty now.
Hate to break it to you buddy - more ganks on you.
